name: Gnome
description: Gnomes are small humanoids known for their boundless curiosity and creativity. They remain fairly mysterious amongst the other peoples of the Viridus Nexus as they live underground and seldom leave their homes. They are natural inventors, blending magical and mechanical ingenuity to create new objects.

options.name: Dual Synapses
options.description: Gnomes have a talent for focusing on Spells and other Complex tasks, gaining a +1 Bonus to Concentration. Additionally, Gnomes can maintain Focus when Unconscious or Sleeping.

options.name: Action [Daily] : Gnomish Touch
options.description: You touch an Object and reveal any Magical Properties on it. Additionally, you can make an Academics Check to appraise the item and determine its approximate value.
